description:
Don’t like rigid posts between your toes? Give these supportive sandals with soft toe loops a try. Pair them with a thick wool sweater and jeans or something dressier. Flexible shock-absorbing base, arch support and a deep heel cup cradle you through every step, because sunset dance parties never go out of style.

  • Supple oiled leather uppers wear well
  • 2 adjustable straps with buckles
  • Soft anatomically shaped cork footbed offers stability and moisture management
  • Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet
  • Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing
  • Toe loops guide your toes into place and promotes natural steps
  • EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks
name: Birkenstock Mayari Oiled Leather Sandals - Women's
